about_the_game:
Welcome to the bustling streets of 'sUper: Taxi Simulation', where the city never sleeps and the roads are your playground! Dive into the driver's seat of your very own taxi in this high-octane simulation game that takes you through the heart of a living, breathing metropolis.

In 'sUper: Taxi Simulation', every fare is a story and every turn a new adventure. Navigate through crowded urban landscapes, zip past towering skyscrapers, and make strategic choices to find the fastest routes. Your goal? To become the most renowned taxi driver in the city!

Experience the thrill of the hustle as you pick up a diverse array of passengers, each with unique destinations and demands. Manage your time and vehicle with skill - balancing speed with safety, as you aim to maximize profits while keeping your customers satisfied.

Customize your cab to stand out in the city traffic. Upgrade your ride with enhanced engines, better tires, and flashy decals. Every choice you make affects your journey – from the car you drive to the routes you pick.

But beware, the city is full of surprises! Day-night cycles, and unexpected traffic jams demand quick thinking and adaptability. Can you outsmart the competition and earn the title of the ultimate cabby?

Challenge yourself in immersive career mode. With realistic physics, detailed environments, and an engaging soundtrack, 'sUper: Taxi Simulation' offers an unparalleled taxi-driving experience.

So, are you ready to hit the gas and take on the city? Strap in, start the meter, and let's go for a ride in 'sUper: Taxi Simulation' – where every fare is an opportunity and every ride a journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or similar
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590 (2GB VRAM)

short_description: Explore the city in 'sUper: Taxi Simulation'! Navigate busy streets, pick up diverse passengers, and customize your cab. Balance speed and safety, tackle traffic and day-night cycles. Thrive in this dynamic taxi driving adventure. Ready, set, drive!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
